name: Asylum - PCA Exclusive - 2023 11x18
additionalNotes: The Asylum PCA Exclusive is available through cigar retailers who attended the annual trade show held by the Premium Cigar Association. Asylum cigars is known for making large ring-gauge cigars that range from mild to medium strength and packed with flavor. Their PCA Exclusive is no exception. This limited edition cigar is handmade at the Aladino Factory in Honduras.
